title: Faith Perfected by Love
itunes:title: Faith Perfected by Love
description: Today's second reading from the letter of James discusses the relationship between faith and love. We need a strong faith, but faith without love is lifeless so we must respond to grace and faith with acts of love.
content:encoded: Today's second reading from the letter of James discusses the relationship between faith and love. We need a strong faith, but faith without love is lifeless so we must respond to grace and faith with acts of love.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
